title: Simulation/VR Language Skill Expertise Development Program Based on the 4C/ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Language skill training applying components of the 4C/ID model (learning tasks, supportive information, part-task practice, coaching) in a VR-simulated environment replicating real workplace settings.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize advanced language expressions appropriate for real job scenarios with 80% accuracy in VR-based simulation environments
Learners systematically solve complex communication problems according to the 4C/ID model through peer feedback and coaching systems
Learners complete and present comprehensive outputs applying job-related language skills through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
